Configure SMS commands used to control your device
This text will be required at the beginning of each SMS command

A command prefix adds security by requiring all commands to start with specific text. For example, if the prefix is "WMD", commands will be "WMD locate", "WMD ring", etc. Choose a unique prefix that only you know.

To control your device remotely, send SMS messages that start with your command prefix (%1$s) followed by a command.

For example, to locate your device, send:

%1$s locate

The device will respond with its location.

Password required for all SMS commands

All SMS commands require a password in this format: "prefix command password [parameters]". For example: "WMD locate mypassword". This adds an extra layer of security to prevent unauthorized use of commands even if someone knows your command prefix.

Available commands:

 %1$s locate %2$s - Get your device's current GPS location
 %1$s ring %2$s - Make your device ring at maximum volume even if silenced
 %1$s callme %2$s - Make your device call you back immediately
 %1$s info %2$s - Get battery level, charging status, and network info
 %1$s ping %2$s - Check if the WMD service is running

 %1$s wifi %2$s off - Turn WiFi off
 %1$s wifi %2$s - Get current WiFi status
 %1$s sound %2$s [mode] - Change sound mode (normal/vibrate/silent) or get status
 %1$s help %2$s - Show this list of commands

Control your device remotely by sending SMS messages in this format:

%1$s command %2$s

For example:

• %1$s locate %2$s - Find your device location
• %1$s ring %2$s - Play loud sound

The device will respond with confirmation or requested information.

Where's My Device is designed to help you locate and control YOUR OWN device remotely if it's lost or stolen. The app requires several permissions to function correctly, which will be requested only when needed.

This app is NOT a surveillance tool, spy app, or hidden tracking software. It is meant for personal device recovery only.

This app is open source and respects your privacy. No data is collected or shared with third parties.
We request permissions only when needed and will explain why each permission is necessary before requesting it. You can always manage permissions in your device settings.
This permission is needed for the app to function properly.
This permission allows the app to receive SMS commands when your device is lost, enabling you to locate and control it remotely.
This permission allows the app to send SMS responses with your device location and status when you request it remotely.
This permission is needed to determine your device\'s location when requested via SMS command.
This permission provides precise location information when you try to locate your lost device.
This permission allows the app to determine your device\'s location even when the app is not actively being used, which is essential for locating a lost device.
This permission allows the app to call you back when you send the \"callme\" command to your lost device.
This permission allows you to easily add trusted contacts to your whitelist from your contact list.
This permission allows the app to adjust sound settings on your device, which is needed for the \"ring\" command to work properly.
This permission allows the app to display important messages and alerts on top of other apps when your device is lost or when receiving commands.

Where\'s My Device is NOT designed for covert surveillance or tracking others without their knowledge. It is meant to be installed on YOUR OWN devices to help you locate them if lost or stolen. Using this app to track others without their knowledge may be illegal in your jurisdiction.
